org.spongepowered.api.event.entity

Interface HealEntityEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, Event, TargetEntityEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHealEntityEvent

    public interface HealEntityEvent
extends TargetEntityEvent, Cancellable
    An event where an Entity is "healed". This can usually mean that after a certain amount of "heal amount" the entity is destroyed. Similar to the DamageEntityEvent, this event uses various modifiers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getBaseHealAmount()
      Gets the "base" healing amount to apply to the targeted Entity.
      double getFinalHealAmount()
      Gets the final heal amount that will be applied to the entity.

      Gets the heal amount for the provided HealthModifier.

      Gets the original "final" amount of healing after all original HealthModifiers are applied to getOriginalHealAmount().

    • Method Detail

      • getOriginalHealAmount

        double getOriginalHealAmount()
        Gets the original amount to "heal" the targeted Entity.
        Returns:
        The original heal amount

      • getOriginalFinalHealAmount

        double getOriginalFinalHealAmount()
        Gets the original "final" amount of healing after all original HealthModifiers are applied to getOriginalHealAmount(). The "final" heal amount is considered the amount gained by the Entity, if health is tracked.
        Returns:
        The final amount of healing to originally deal

      • getOriginalHealingAmounts

        Map<HealthModifier,Double> getOriginalHealingAmounts()
        Gets an Map of all original HealthModifiers and their associated "modified" heal amount. Note that ordering is not retained.
        Returns:
        An immutable map of the original modified heal amounts

      • getFinalHealAmount

        double getFinalHealAmount()
        Gets the final heal amount that will be applied to the entity. The final heal amount is the end result of the getBaseHealAmount() being applied in DoubleUnaryOperator.applyAsDouble(double) available from all the Tuples of HealthModifier to DoubleUnaryOperator in getOriginalFunctions().
        Returns:
        The final heal amount to deal

      • getOriginalHealingModifierAmount

        double getOriginalHealingModifierAmount(HealthModifier healthModifier)
        Gets the original healing amount for the provided HealthModifier. If the provided HealthModifier was not included in getOriginalHealingAmounts(), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The original healing modifier
        Returns:
        The original healing change

      • getOriginalFunctions

        List<HealthFunction> getOriginalFunctions()
        Gets the original List of HealthFunctions that was originally passed into the event.
        Returns:
        The list of heal amount modifier functions

      • getBaseHealAmount

        double getBaseHealAmount()
        Gets the "base" healing amount to apply to the targeted Entity. The "base" heal amount is the original value before passing along the chain of DoubleUnaryOperators for all known HealthModifiers.
        Returns:
        The base heal amount

      • setBaseHealAmount

        void setBaseHealAmount(double healAmount)
        Sets the "base" healing amount to apply to the targeted Entity. The "base" heal amount is the original value passed along the chain of DoubleUnaryOperators for all known HealthModifiers.
        Parameters:
        healAmount - The base heal amount

      • isModifierApplicable

        boolean isModifierApplicable(HealthModifier healthModifier)
        Checks whether the provided HealthModifier is applicable to the current available HealthModifiers.
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The health modifier to check
        Returns:
        True if the health modifier is relevant to this event

      • getHealAmount

        double getHealAmount(HealthModifier healthModifier)
        Gets the heal amount for the provided HealthModifier. Providing that isModifierApplicable(HealthModifier) returns true, the cached "heal amount" for the HealthModifier is returned.
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The heal amount modifier to get the heal amount for
        Returns:
        The modifier

      • setHealAmount

        void setHealAmount(HealthModifier healthModifier,
                   DoubleUnaryOperator function)
        Sets the provided DoubleUnaryOperator to be used for the given HealthModifier. If the HealthModifier is already included in getModifiers(), the DoubleUnaryOperator replaces the existing function. If there is no HealthFunction for the HealthModifier, a new one is created and added to the end of the list of DoubleUnaryOperators to be applied to the getBaseHealAmount().

        If needing to create a custom HealthModifier is required, usage of the HealthModifier.Builder is recommended.

        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The heal amount modifier
        function - The function to map to the modifier

      • getModifiers

        List<HealthFunction> getModifiers()
        Gets a list of simple HealthFunctions. All HealthModifier s are applicable to the entity based on the HealingSource and any possible invulnerabilities due to the HealingSource.
        Returns:
        A list of heal amount modifiers to functions
